item.title: The Blood of Dawnwalker reveal event set for January 13, 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/the-blood-of-dawnwalker-reveal-event-set-for-january-13-2025

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

New action RPG from Bandai Namco and Rebel Wolves.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Rebel Wolves will host a reveal event for The Blood of Dawnwalker, formerly Dawnwalker, on January 13 at 1:00 p.m. PT / 4:00 p.m. ET, the companies announced.

The Blood of Dawnwalker is the first chapter of Rebel Wolves’ new role-playing saga, described as a single-player open-world dark fantasy action RPG with a strong focus on story and narrative. It is developed on Unreal Engine 5, and will be available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC when it launches.

Watch the teaser trailer below.

Title Reveal and Game Reveal Event Announce Teaser

item.title: MATCHO launches March 13, 2025 for PS5 and PC, later for Xbox Series
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/matcho-launches-march-13-2025-for-ps5-and-pc-later-for-xbox-series

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Match-3 first-person shooter gets a release date.

Match-3 first-person shooter MATCHO will launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on March 13, 2025, followed by Xbox Series at a later date, developer FiolaSoft Studio announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

Find A Cure, Save The World

Start your new epic journey in MATCHO with Max and his friends as he tackles a mysterious alien invasion that could lead to curing his illness and saving the Earth.

MATCHO is bringing puzzles into the combat. It’s match-3 first-person shooter—a unique combination of genres that merges frenetic shooting with quick decision-making. Explore story-driven chapters as you choose destiny for Max, his friends, and the rest of the world. Fight in action-packed arenas like never before and explore intricate areas—all that with breathtaking visuals and an insane arsenal of abilities including the freedom of parkour movement.

This is a full-featured indie videogame developed with love by a small group of friends and developers from the Czech Republic. And it‘s first-person shooter like you’ve never experienced before.

Earth Is In a Crisis, But You Can Save It

Navigate through a series of exciting platforming sections, solve ingenious puzzles and talk with many lovable characters you’ll encounter as Max. MATCHO is our own take on a modern super-hero story, with breathtaking visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5.

Key Features

  • Intense and clever tactical fighting built around the match-3 shooter concept.
  • Dazzling visuals powered by Unreal Engine.
  • A non-linear, humor-packed plot with multiple endings.
  • An extensive, built-in parkour system lets you wall-run, double-jump, float and dash in any direction.
  • A modern take on clever puzzle design and platforming experience.
  • Spectacular combo chains to execute and enjoy.
  • A cast of colorful characters with full English voiceovers.
  • Accessibility settings for colorblindness and difficulty curve adjustment.

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Czech Voice-Over and Release Date Trailer

Pure Battle Arena Gameplay Demo

item.title: Arknights: Endfield third gameplay demonstration video
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/arknights-endfield-third-gameplay-demonstration-video

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

15 minutes of new footage.

Publisher GRYPHLINE and developer Mountain Contour have released the third official gameplay demonstration video for Arknights: Endfield, its upcoming real-time 3D RPG with strategic gameplay elements.

Arknights: Endfield will be available for PlayStation 5, PC, iOS, and Android when it launches. A release date has yet to be announced. A PC beta test is planned for mid-January 2025.

Watch the video below.

Gameplay Demo #3

Korean

Traditional Chinese
